article_title: Emails show indecision, lack of communication plagued MU graduate student insurance decision
article_text:
Columbia, MO (65201)

Today

Cloudy early with scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 77F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , hank foley, r. bowen loftin, tim evans, ben trachtenberg, mu faculty council, graduate students, graduate professional council, penn state, florida state, mu, alabama, auburn, louisiana state, leona rubin, garnett stokes, karen gruen, um system
article_metadata.author: Austin Huguelet

og.description: While faculty and graduate students were left in the dark, Leona Rubin, vice chancellor for graduate studies, struggled to get the go-ahead for solutions she hoped would ease the impact
